p: According to Singh and coworkers [ 56], leaf EOs are “rich in the distal compounds of the dihydrotagetone biosynthetic pathway which proceeds in the direction of ( Z)-β-ocimene, ( E)- and ( Z)-tagetenone, ( E)-and ( Z)-tagetone, and dihydrotagetone”; five groups of leaf EOs can be recognized, classified according to geographical origins ( Table 12).
